pullrequest.title: Ian's fix for log segfault, issue #706

content.raw:
There is a segfault and a core dump (it's stored in our Amazon jenkins machine at /home/ubuntu/core_6) in test sandia_hand_gpu_publishers.test [drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-amazon-vrc 6](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-amazon-vrc/6/parsed_console/?). Hard to reproduce without having the same binaries, but I did a local installation with DebWithRelInfo and try to get something. I'm not sure about how reliable is this (specially with warning messages for transport, physics and util gazebo libs, but **no** warning for render lib),  please do not trust as an usual good trace:

```
warning: .dynamic section for "/home/jrivero/projects/gazebo-debfilesystem/usr/lib/libgazebo_util.so.1" is not at the expected address (wrong library or version mismatch?)
warning: .dynamic section for "/home/jrivero/projects/gazebo-debfilesystem/usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1" is not at the expected address (wrong library or version mismatch?)
warning: .dynamic section for "/home/jrivero/projects/gazebo-debfilesystem/usr/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1" is not at the expected address (wrong library or version mismatch?)
warning: Could not load shared library symbols for 5 libraries, e.g. /usr/lib/libgazebo_physics_bullet.so.1.
Use the "info sharedlibrary" command to see the complete listing.
Do you need "set solib-search-path" or "set sysroot"?
[Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled]
Using host libthread_db library "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libthread_db.so.1".
btCore was generated by `gzserver -s libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so atlas_sandia_hands.world -q __name:=gaz'.
Program terminated with signal 11, Segmentation fault.
#0  0x00002ba80e07944a in std::__detail::_List_node_base::_M_unhook() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00002ba80e07944a in std::__detail::_List_node_base::_M_unhook() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#1  0x00002ba810995f89 in gazebo::rendering::Scene::OnSkyMsg (this=0x64f2bc0, _msg=...)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo-debrelinfo/gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc:2303
#2  0x00002ba80e0c9232 in __dynamic_cast () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#3  0x00002aab14400a70 in ?? ()
#4  0x00000000021ade90 in ?? ()
#5  0x00002aab1c01bd80 in ?? ()
#6  0x00000000ffffffff in ?? ()
#7  0x0000000002331f38 in ?? ()
#8  0x0000000002331f10 in ?? ()
#9  0x00002ba8109b77a9 in atomic_exchange_and_add (dv=-1, pw=0x2aab14400b0c) at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/detail/sp_counted_base_gcc_x86.hpp:50
#10 weak_release (this=0x2aab14400b00) at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/detail/sp_counted_base_gcc_x86.hpp:157
#11 release (this=0x2aab14400b00) at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/detail/sp_counted_base_gcc_x86.hpp:146
#12 release (this=0x2aab14400b00) at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo-debrelinfo/gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc:2694
#13 operator= (r=..., this=0x2aab14400a68) at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/detail/shared_count.hpp:253
#14 shared_ptr<google::protobuf::Message> (r=..., this=0x2aab14400a60) at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:263
#15 boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<gazebo::msgs::Visual, google::protobuf::Message> (r=...) at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:522
```
content.html:
There is a segfault and a core dump (it's stored in our Amazon jenkins machine at /home/ubuntu/core_6) in test sandia_hand_gpu_publishers.test drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-amazon-vrc 6. Hard to reproduce without having the same binaries, but I did a local installation with DebWithRelInfo and try to get something. I'm not sure about how reliable is this (specially with warning messages for transport, physics and util gazebo libs, but no warning for render lib), please do not trust as an usual good trace:

warning: .dynamic section for "/home/jrivero/projects/gazebo-debfilesystem/usr/lib/libgazebo_util.so.1" is not at the expected address (wrong library or version mismatch?)
warning: .dynamic section for "/home/jrivero/projects/gazebo-debfilesystem/usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1" is not at the expected address (wrong library or version mismatch?)
warning: .dynamic section for "/home/jrivero/projects/gazebo-debfilesystem/usr/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1" is not at the expected address (wrong library or version mismatch?)
warning: Could not load shared library symbols for 5 libraries, e.g. /usr/lib/libgazebo_physics_bullet.so.1.
Use the "info sharedlibrary" command to see the complete listing.
